chapters.title: Glossary
chapters.info: Natti Cauthon, p. 701 (995)—Abell's wife, Mat's mother. She and two of her daughters were arrested by the Whitecloaks as Darkfriends because of Fain's suggestions that Mat was a Darkfriend before Perrin led the residents of the Two Rivers to drive the Trollocs and Whitecloaks out. See also Cauthon, Abell; Cauthon, Bodewhin; Cauthon, Eldrin; Cauthon, Matrim.
